source:
TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Nielden would go to the side of someone who needs him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête
Nielden semble nostalgique.

source:
TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_01Nielden shares with you some more background about his fallen friend Colphas, and how he raised his daughter Callea all by himself. The Galdjent guard also confesses a lack of confidence that he will be able to offer the girl everything she needs, and asks if you would be willing to go with him and lend a helping hand. Moved by his generosity and sympathy for the orphaned girl's plight, he resolves to make the trip back to Fort Jobb.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_01* Cette quête est  synchronisée avec votre niveau.

Nielden vous a un peu plus parlé de son défunt camarade Colphas et vous a demandé de l'accompagner jusqu'à Fort Jobb afin d'aider la pauvre Callea.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_02<tab>Back at Fort Jobb, Callea profusely expresses her gratitude to you and Nielden, though it is clear that the girl is still struggling to come to terms with her father's sudden passing. Feeling that she is woefully unprepared to follow on in her father's footsteps, she has a mind to close down the infirmary and begin a new life in the Crystarium. At Nielden's asking, you set off for the city to arrange temporary lodgings for Callea with Sylgham at the Catenaries.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_02<tab>La jeune femme a été réconfortée en voyant Nielden venir auprès d'elle. Ne pouvant s'occuper de l'infirmerie que son père avait créée, elle vous a expliqué qu'elle avait décidé d'aller s'installer à Cristarium. Considérant qu'elle y serait plus en sécurité qu'à Fort Jobb, le soldat lui a suggéré d'aller aux Chaînettes. Il vous a alors demandé d'aller voir Sylgham pour savoir s'il y a une chambre pour Callea.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_03<tab>At the Catenaries, the clerk Sylgham sympathizes with Callea's plight. Despite the recent trying circumstances, he is pleased to be able to inform you a room has just opened up, and offers to reserve it immediately for your orphaned acquaintance. Brave the road back to Fort Jobb and share the good news with your friends.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_03<tab>Sylgham s'est montré très compréhensif et vous a dit que lui et son personnel feraient tout leur possible pour aider la jeune femme à s'installer à Cristarium. Allez dire tout ça à Callea.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_04<tab>You return to Fort Jobb to a disconcerting scene. Though Nielden and Callea are pleased to hear the news, they seem preoccupied with something that has happened in your absence. Allow Callea a moment to compose herself, and then inquire as to what the matter is.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_04<tab>Lorsque vous l'avez rejointe, Callea s'est réjouie de savoir qu'elle pourrait s'installer aux Chaînettes, mais apparemment, il y a un petit problème...

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Callea at Fort Jobb.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Callea, à Fort Jobb

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Sylgham at the Catenaries.
TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Callea at Fort Jobb.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_TODO_02<tab>Faire un rapport à Callea, à Fort Jobb

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_000<tab>Well, there's nothin' to be gained from standin' around here mopin'. Callea needs me, so I'd best take to the road.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_000<tab>Tu sais, Colphas avait perdu sa femme très tôt. Il avait dû élever sa fille seul, ce qui n'était pas facile quand on pense à toutes ses res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>tés...

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_001<tab>Colphas lost both his dear wife and parents not long after the girl was born. Raised Callea all by himself, he did. They weren't rich by any means, but still he saw that she wanted for nothing.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_001<tab>Je parle, je parle, mais ça ne sert à rien de me morfondre ici. Je dois plutôt aller auprès de Callea au plus vite.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_002<tab>I can't even imagine what the poor girl's goin' through, all alone in this dangerous world. As Colphas's close friend, it's my duty to be there for her an' see to whatever she needs.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_002<tab>Mais dis-moi, si tu n'as rien d'autre à faire, veux-tu bien m'accompagner<var 1D /var>? Désormais, la pauvre enfant doit avoir beaucoup de choses à régler avec la disparition soudaine de son père. Elle a sûrement besoin de beaucoup d'aide.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_003<tab>Come to think of it, don't suppose ye'd be interested in comin' along? I'm just one man, and lookin' after Callea isn't likely to be an easy task.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_003<tab>Je ne pense pas que je pourrais faire ça seul. Tu pourrais donc nous être d'un grand secours...

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_004<tab>Yer a lifesaver, friend! I'm sure that it'll mean the world to the girl. And with that, I'd best be gatherin' my belongings. See ye back at Fort Jobb!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_004Merci encore!
Bien, je pars pour Fort Jobb immédiatement. À plus tard!

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_011<tab>Uncle Nielden...you came all the way here for me?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_011<tab>Nielden<var 1D /var>! Je savais que tu viendrais en apprenant la nouvelle. Merci.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_012<tab>And you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... How can I ever repay you for your generosity?

TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_013<tab>Think nothin' of it, girl! Poor thing...ye've been through more than any child should have to suffer. But don't you worry─Uncle Nielden and <var 08 E905 ((Aunt)) ((Uncle)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> are here to see to your every need.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_013<tab>J'imagine que tu dois être débordée, mais ne t'inquiète pas, nous sommes ici pour t'aider.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_014<tab>You truly are too kind... Everyone has been─why, even those here in the fort I have never spoken to before have stopped by to offer their sympathies. Whatever have I done to deserve such kindness?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_014<tab>Vraiment<var 1D /var>? C'est gentil de votre part. Les gens du fort me soutiennent autant qu'ils le peuvent. Si seulement je pouvais faire quelque chose pour eux en retour...

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_015<tab>Reckon yer old man is to thank for that. The people loved him, Callea, and they know that his daughter and assistant is cut from the same cloth. Ye've got nothin' to feel guilty about.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_015<tab>Tu n'as pas à t'en faire pour ça. C'est normal après tout ce que ton père a fait pour tout le monde ici. Dans ce genre de situation, il est normal de faire appel aux autres.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_016<tab>What...what are you saying, Uncle Nielden? It's my fault...all of it. I never should have let him go to that terrible place...
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_016<tab>Je sais, mais je m'en veux... Si j'avais retenu mon père, il serait encore parmi nous...

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_017<tab>Don't even think of blamin' yerself for that, Callea. Yer father went there because he felt it was his duty. A hundred men couldn't have stopped that stubborn bastard once he made up his mind.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_017<tab>Il avait un grand sens du devoir. J'imagine qu'il est im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment parti pour Holminster, lorsqu'il a appris que des purgateurs l'attaquaient. Rien de ce que tu aurais pu dire ne l'aurait empêché d'y aller, à mon avis.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_018<tab>Yes, this is what everyone tells me. That Father was a talented physician, and a great man. That he is a hero who did not shy in the face of danger, and sacrificed himself in the name of our cause. This I know, and yet...and yet...
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_018<tab>... Oui. Tout le monde loue son courage et son dévouement. Il était prêt à risquer sa vie pour sauver celle des autres.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_019<tab>To me, he was my <var 1A 02 /var>father<var 1A 01 /var>! As cruel as it sounds, I couldn't care less that he died a hero! I wanted him to <var 1A 02 /var>live<var 1A 01 /var>! But still, he left me... He...he did not even give me the chance to say good-bye...
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_019<tab>Je suis si triste qu'il soit mort. J'aurais voulu qu'il prenne moins de risques... Il me laissait seule à chaque fois qu'il fallait aller soigner quelqu'un. Et maintenant, il ne reviendra plus jamais...

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_020<tab>Callea... Yer old man may have left ye here, but ye never left his mind and heart...not for one moment. Ye were more important to him than anythin'.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_020<tab>Callea. Tu comptais beaucoup pour lui. Je te l'assure.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_021<tab>I know this, and yet...I do not understand. His duty, his patients, his daughter...how could any one man be so selfless!? Did he never stop to think of <var 1A 02 /var>himself<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_021<tab>J'en suis consciente. Mais je ne comprends pas pourquoi il se consacrait autant aux autres, aux dépens de sa propre personne<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce que ça lui a apporté en fin de compte<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_100_021<tab>Forgive me, my friends. I...I am still feeling a bit overwhelmed by it all.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_100_021<tab>Pardon... Je me suis un peu trop emportée...

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_022<tab>No apologies needed, girl. Ye've had it harder than any of us. And yet, we have to carry on without him somehow...all of us do. So tell me, Callea. What do ye plan on doin' now?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_022<tab>Non, je comprends ton sentiment. Mais dis-moi, que comptes-tu faire désormais<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_023<tab>The sick and wounded still show up at these doors. My heart aches for them, yet I am but a physician's assistant. I simply cannot offer them the treatment that Father once did.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_023<tab>Je ne suis pas en mesure de soigner les gens comme le faisait mon père. Je ne peux donc pas m'occuper de l'infirmerie.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_024<tab>And so I think I will head for the Crystarium. I will shutter the doors of the infirmary, sell the furniture and equipment for what little they are worth, and use the coin to fund my trip.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_024<tab>Je pense par conséquent que je ferais mieux de vendre tout l'équipement et les affaires ici et de m'installer à Cristarium. Recommencer à zéro, en quelque sorte.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_025<tab>Aye...perhaps that would be for the best. It'd be safe there, at least, an' as good a place as any to start a new life.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_025<tab>Je vois. Cela me soulagerait de te savoir en sécurité là-bas. Je pourrais même t'y conduire.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_026<tab>There's a residence hall there─the Catenaries, they call it─where they give room and board to refugees and others lookin' to make the Crystarium their new home. You can take shelter there till ye find a job and place of yer own.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_026<tab>Tu pourrais commencer par habiter aux Chaînettes. Il me semble qu'ils ont des chambres pour les gens comme toi.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_027<tab>Say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, would ye mind goin' on ahead to make the arrangements? The boy Sylgham there's an acquaintance of mine. Space is always tight, but let him know of Callea's situation and I reckon he'll be able to find a room for her.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_027<tab>Dis, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, pourrais-tu aller voir Sylgham, aux Chaînettes, et lui expliquer la situation de Callea, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>? Pendant ce temps, nous allons préparer les bagages.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_028<tab>I cannot even begin to express the depths of my gratitude, friend. Thank you.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_028<tab>Je vous remercie vraiment pour toute votre aide. J'ai vraiment de la chance d'avoir fait votre con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_100_040<tab>Greetings, and welcome to the Catenaries. How may I be of service to you today?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_100_040<tab>Bienvenue aux Chaînettes. En quoi puis-je vous aider, <var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Monsieur)) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_040<tab>A young girl has been orphaned at Fort Jobb, you say? This is tragic, indeed. But worry not─a room just opened up earlier today. I will reserve it for Miss Callea straightaway.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_040<tab>Je comprends. Veuillez dire à cette personne que nous allons préparer une chambre pour elle.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_041<tab>Your timing is most fortunate. Ever since the raid on Holminster Switch, refugees have been pouring in day after day, and our rooms can only hold so many.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_041<tab>Depuis l'attaque des purgateurs contre Holminster, nous avons accueilli de nombreux réfugiés, mais par chance, il nous reste des lits libres.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_042<tab>But do not worry. We will do everything we can for your young acquaintance. There are others here who have suffered similar tragedies, and can doubtless sympathize with her plight. She will be among friends.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_042<tab>La perte de son père a dû pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment affecter cette demoiselle.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_043<tab>Needless to say, I and the rest of the staff will also watch over her closely, and see to her needs until such time as she has acclimated to life here in the Crystarium. Tell her to come in safety, and that we look forward to welcoming her to our halls.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_043<tab>Veuillez lui dire que nous allons faire tout notre possible pour la soutenir et lui permettre de traverser cette dure épreuve.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_044<tab>The necessary paperwork has been filed, and there will be a room waiting for Miss Callea upon her arrival. You may tell the girl and Nielden that there is naught to worry about.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_044<tab>Nous allons préparer une chambre pour ma<var 16 /var>de<var 16 /var>moi<var 16 /var>sel<var 16 /var>le Callea. Veuillez lui dire que nous allons faire tout notre possible pour la soutenir et lui permettre de traverser cette dure épreuve.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_050<tab>Ah, there ye are. I trust all went well at the Crystarium? 'Fraid to say we had somethin' of an incident here. I'll let Callea give ye the news...
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_050<tab>Ah, tu tombes bien, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Nous avons un petit souci. Je laisse Callea t'expliquer de quoi il s'agit.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_051<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I cannot thank you enough for all that you have done for me. I very much look forward to settling in to my new home at the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_051<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous revoilà enfin. Je vous remercie de vous être donné la peine d'aller jusqu'aux Chaînettes pour moi.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_052<tab>And yet I fear there's been something of a complication. Uncle Nielden and I had all but finished packing my things, when...! Ah, but forgive me a moment. I must collect my thoughts.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_052<tab>Nielden m'a aidée à préparer mes bagages, mais il y a un petit imprévu...
